original_text:
So he left all that he had in Joseph's charge, and because of him he had no concern about anything but the food he ate.
Now Joseph was handsome in form and appearance.
korean_text: 주인이 그의 소유를 다 요셉의 손에 위탁하고 자기가 먹는 음식 외에는 간섭하지 아니하였더라 요셉은 용모가 빼어나고 아름다웠더라

sentences.original_text: So he left all that he had in Joseph's charge
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 자기가 가진 모든 것을 요셉에게 맡겼습니다.

sentences.original_text: he had no concern about anything
